author: Lao Tzu
message: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: It is difficult to achieve a spirit of genuine cooperation as long as people remain indifferent to the feelings and happiness of others.
title: Thought of the day

author: Benjamin Franklin
message: Experience keeps a dear school, but fools will learn in no other.
title: Thought of the day

author: Thornton Wilder
message: We can only be said to be alive in those moments when our hearts are conscious of our treasures.
title: Thought of the day
